statements: SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM UserPreferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, location, music_genre_pref, favorite_artists FROM UserPreferences WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT full_name, location FROM UserPreferences WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT DISTINCT music_genre_pref FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT full_name, age, gender, location FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age, gender, location, last_login FROM UserPreferences WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age, location FROM UserPreferences WHERE age > 30 AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, music_genre_pref FROM UserPreferences WHERE music_genre_pref IN ('Pop', 'Rock', 'Hip Hop') LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, full_name, favorite_artists FROM UserPreferences WHERE last_login > '2021-09-01' AND favorite_artists IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_login DESC, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preferred_genres FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, email, name FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_genres, email FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_genres LIKE '%Rock%';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_genres LIKE '%Pop%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, preferred_genres FROM user_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND LENGTH(name) > 5;
SELECT lh.user_id, lp.name, lh.last_login FROM user_preferences lp INNER JOIN listening_habits lh ON lp.user_id = lh.user_id ORDER BY lh.last_login DESC;

SELECT * FROM songs
SELECT song_title, artist FROM songs

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist, genre FROM songs WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_songs > 5;
SELECT u.username, s.song_title FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN songs s ON s.song_id = up.song_id;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT title, artist, genre FROM songs WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, song_id, rating FROM user_preferences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM listening_history ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT user_id, song_id, rating FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, song_id, timestamp FROM listening_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';

SELECT user_id, user_name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;

SELECT artist_name, genre, popularity FROM artists ORDER BY popularity DESC;

SELECT artist_name, genre, popularity FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY popularity DESC;
SELECT user_id, song_name, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 180 ORDER BY song_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, age, registration_date FROM users WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Male';
